description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 14 August 2018 (RN: 18/03832/FULL) for, 'Use as a single family dwellinghouse (Class C3), demolition of rear extension at lower ground floor level to create new external courtyard, installation of plant enclosure in rear courtyard, excavation beneath pavement vaults and associated external alterations'; NAMELY, to make the following amendments to the approved development: (i) Further lowering of the pavement vaults; (ii) Reconfiguration of internal walls and partitions; (iii) New roof access hatch; (iv) Reduction in size of plant enclosure to rear courtyard; (v) Window alterations to the rear; and (vi) Additional minor external and internal alterations.  (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
